danmorrill wrote:
> Hi folks,
>
> I made a good batch file for launching heritrix on Windows XP Media
> Center, AMD processor, 1 Gig of RAM, HP Paviliion, SP2 with all
> updates as of 1/23/3006. Just thought I would share it back with the
> group since this group pointed me in some really good directions on
> how to set this up.
>
> I have it running under d:\heritrix feel free to change that to suit
> your will. Plus I had to download the latest Java JRE to complete
> the process. happy crawling
Thanks Dan.  I added pointer to the windows section of the FAQ.
St.Ack

>
> regards
> Dan Morrill
>
> ---------------CUT-N-PASTE to Heritrix.bat ------
>
>
> set HERITRIX_HOME=d:\heritrix
> set CLASSPATH=d:\heritrix\heritrix-1.6.0.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\ant-
> 1.6.2.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\colt-subset-
> 1.2.0.kb.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-cli-
> 1.0.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-codec-
> 1.3.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-collections-
> 3.1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-httpclient-3.0-
> rc3.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-logging-
> 1.0.4.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-pool-
> 1.2.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\concurrent-1.3.2.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\dnsjava-
> 1.6.2.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\dsi-unimi-it-
> 1.0.0.kb.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\itext-
> 1.2.0.jar;d:\heretrix\lib\j5compat-0.1.0.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\jasper-
> compiler-tomcat-4.1.30.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\jasper-runtime-tomcat-
> 4.1.30.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\javaswf-CVS-SNAPSHOT-
> 1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\je-2.0.90.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\jetty-
> 4.2.23.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\jmxri-1.2.1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\jmxtools-
> 1.2.1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\junit-3.8.1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\libidn-
> 0.5.9.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\MirrorJNDI-1.0.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\poi-2.0-
> RC1-20031102.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\poi-scratchpad-2.0-RC1-
> 20031102.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\servlet-tomcat-4.1.30.jar
> java -D -Xmx256m org.archive.crawler.Heritrix
>
> -------------------End batch file Cut-N-Paste---------------
>
>
>
